com.device.kerberos.rest.client

Interface IKerberosRequestServiceTicketClient

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KerberosRequestServiceTicketClientImpl

    public interface IKerberosRequestServiceTicketClient
    This interface allows to get the ServiceTicket from the Kerberos Server for the service to be invoked by the Application
    Author:
    raunak

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ServiceTicket getServiceTicketForApp(java.lang.String serviceName, KerberosAppSession appSession)
      This method retrieves the ServiceTicket from the Kerberos Server.

    • Method Detail

      • getServiceTicketForApp

        ServiceTicket getServiceTicketForApp(java.lang.String serviceName,
                                   KerberosAppSession appSession)
                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                            RestClientException
        This method retrieves the ServiceTicket from the Kerberos Server. It requires IKerberosAuthenticationClient kerberosAuthentication() method to be called before this
        Parameters:
        serviceName - String UID (as given in the Apache DS) of the service for which ServiceTicket has to be fetched
        appSession - KerberosAppSession of the Application for whom the ServiceTicket is being fetched
        Returns:
        ServiceTicket or null if the input parameters are not valid
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - In case there are some errors encountered while retrieving information
        RestClientException - If the status of the response is not 200. The server side error message and error response code can be accessed using getMessage and getErrorCode methods respectively
